text: Marína is the name of a Slovak romantic poem by Andrej Sládkovič (Andrej Braxatoris) written in 1844 and published 2 years later in 1846 in Pešť. It is his most significant poem, also translated to German, Polish, Hungarian and French. Marína has 291 stanzas and 2900 lines. ==References== ==External links== * Full text * Entry at worldrecordacademy.com Category:Love poems Category:Slovak-language poems Category:1844 poems
title: Marína
